Articles.Content:
After a request to acually post this thing I am. Keep in mind this is more of a replica than a "fighter" so being in the sky isn't the best. If you do want a fighter take a look at my other craft, I am sure you will find something. Anyways the thing is a little sloppy in the sky, so i would recomend SAS and a joystick, which mine won't work. I usualy don't make replicas so it isn't the best in my opinon, but it isnt the worst. I will let the pictures have a say now.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

There is a VTOL trainer again, let me know if you want me to "release" it. I hope you like my not good/bad replica and if you do have any segestions or comments please comment. I am newer to this replica thing so I would like a little constructive criticism.

Download: http://www./view/wiv24h3b748589d/AF-15_Eagle.craft

Thanks for sharing, it looks like this Eagle is one of the hardest to create with only stock parts, according to the many version available. This one is a bit SAS-killer (it bounce very fast on pitch) and wings doesn't generate enough lift IMHO. Quite a pain to fly but easy to land .

Thanks for sharing, it looks like this Eagle is one of the hardest to create with only stock parts, according to the many version available. This one is a bit SAS-killer (it bounce very fast on pitch) and wings doesn't generate enough lift IMHO. Quite a pain to fly but easy to land .

Yes, I often cut the test fights short. It is pain that I can't solve. Thanks though, Eagles aren't the easiest to make, and I had to sacrafice looks for ummm non annoying ness. Also there is a lot of hidden wings, for some reason they don't do anything.

I understand.

I forgot: rear landing gears are a bit too ahead to the engine, I "cut" them on my 1st take-off (I know, I was a bit too aggressive on the pitch).

I understand.

I forgot: rear landing gears are a bit too ahead to the engine, I "cut" them on my 1st take-off (I know, I was a bit too aggressive on the pitch).

Oh yes, the tail strike, I forgot about that I ment to change that but it would conflict with my lifting up quickly rule. But it is a little realistic because you don't just yank the joystick on a multi million dollar jet, even though I often do.
Nice F-15! The engines look a bit far apart though, almost like those on a F-14.

it looks like this Eagle is one of the hardest to create with only stock parts

Hmm... I don't think so. There are planes much harder to recreate, than F-15.

Challenge accept.

I'll make my own version, to find out is it really true

Nice F-15! The engines look a bit far apart though, almost like those on a F-14.

Not that far apart, but a little far apart.

Hmm... I don't think so. There are planes much harder to recreate, than F-15.

Challenge accept.

I'll make my own version, to find out is it really true

Alright well have fun, it probably will look better and not be Anti-SAS.

Alright well have fun, it probably will look better and not be Anti-SAS.

Don't be so sure You craft looks great ;d

I got some nice crafts, but I'm releasing just pretty ones, not every I create ;d F-15 can be failure

Don't be so sure You craft looks great ;d

I got some nice crafts, but I'm releasing just pretty ones, not every I create ;d F-15 can be failure

Well best of luck to you.
